articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: How Joe Biden and his team decided to kill the world's most wanted terrorist
articles.description: Before he gave the order to kill Ayman al-Zawahiri, President Joe Biden wanted to intimately understand where the al Qaeda leader was hiding.
articles.content:
(CNN)Before he gave the order to kill Ayman al-Zawahiri, President Joe Biden wanted to intimately understand where the al Qaeda leader was hiding.

articles.title: Who was al Qaeda leader and key 9/11 architect Ayman al-Zawahiri?
articles.description: Al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri's death at the hands of a US drone strike brings an end to his "trail of murder and violence against American citizens," President Joe Biden said Monday evening.

articles.title: Video: Al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri killed, President Biden says - CNN Video
articles.description: President Joe Biden announces that the US has killed al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri in a drone strike inside Afghanistan.

articles.title: Video: Al Qaeda expert has theory on why al-Zawahiri was killed - CNN Video
articles.description: The US successfully targeted al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri in a drone strike in Afghanistan, according to multiple sources familiar with the matter. The US government has not yet confirmed his death. CNN's National Security Analyst Peter Bergen has more.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Kylie Atwood, Natasha Bertrand and Donald Judd, CNN
articles.title: US kills al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri in drone strike in Afghanistan
articles.description: The United States killed al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri in a drone strike, according to multiple sources familiar with the matter.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez, CNN
articles.title: Two ultra-rare floods in a single week; a wildfire generating its own weather. Here's how it's connected
articles.description: Extreme weather on both ends of the spectrum has thrashed parts of the US over the past week -- one of the many signals that climate change is here now, scientists say.
articles.content: Remarkable satellite imagery this AM in NorCal/OR. #McKinneyFire exploded last night, generating massive pyrocumulonimbus cloud ~50,000 ft tall (!!). You can see smoke at two different heights: most … [+151 chars]

articles.author: Hannah Rabinowitz, CNN
articles.title: Jan 6. rioter who carried gun to US Capitol and threatened Nancy Pelosi gets more than 7 years in prison
articles.description: A federal judge on Monday sentenced Guy Reffitt, who brought a gun to the US Capitol during the January 6, 2021, riot and threatened House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, to more than seven years in prison, the longest insurrection-related sentence to date.

articles.title: Photos: The war in Afghanistan
articles.description: Less than a month after the 9/11 attacks, American and allied forces began combat operations in Afghanistan. Now, nearly two decades later, the United States has withdrawn most of its troops from the country and the Taliban have regained control.
